com.rift.coad.daemon.messageservice
Interface NamedQueue

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface NamedQueue
extends java.rmi.Remote

This interface supplies access to a queue within the message service.

Method Summary
 void addService(java.lang.String service)
          This method adds a service to the list of services used to identify this queue, by the service broker.
 java.util.List listServices()
          This method returns a list of services used to identify this queue to the service broker.
 Message receive(long delay)
          This method returns a message for processing.
 void removeService(java.lang.String service)
          This method removes a service from the list of services.
 

Method Detail

receive

Message receive(long delay)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                       MessageServiceException
This method returns a message for processing. It is designed to auto acknowledge. This means that when the transaction is commited the message will be removed from the named queue.

Parameters:
delay - The delay before returning a null reference.
Returns:
The reference to the Message for processing.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MessageServiceException
TimeoutException

addService

void addService(java.lang.String service)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                       MessageServiceException
This method adds a service to the list of services used to identify this queue, by the service broker.

Parameters:
service - The string containing the service name.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MessageServiceException

listServices

java.util.List listServices()
                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                   MessageServiceException
This method returns a list of services used to identify this queue to the service broker.

Returns:
The list of service used to identify this queue to the service broker.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MessageServiceException

removeService

void removeService(java.lang.String service)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                          MessageServiceException
This method removes a service from the list of services.

Parameters:
service - The name of the service to remove.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MessageServiceException
